title: Soleil rouge maritime
description: blue \"sky\"; black \"ground\"; high horizon line; red open circle at top center encompassing ground and sky; turquoise wavy line on bottom of red circle; blue and green wavy lines on ground, with turquoise line near bottom of green band; painted on both sides of glass
